room_title: Escape room "Amnesia" by Puzzle Effect Denver in Denver
review: I always have such a good experience here! The staff is so friendly and all the rooms are so well done. I have done most of the ones they have available here. I am always satisfied and enjoy my time even if we don’t escape.

room_title: Escape room "Amnesia" by Puzzle Effect Denver in Denver
review: This was my first time doing the escape room and I love it. I do recommend this escape room all the staff were awesome!!!! Thanks again for a great night

room_title: Escape room "Amnesia" by Puzzle Effect Denver in Denver
review: We (ages 55,31,26,23,18&18) went to the Denver Escape Room on the way to the airport after spending a week in Colorado. We thoroughly enjoyed it. The staff was amazing. Josh spent about 10 minutes after our time was up explaining how they set up the rooms etc. Even if you have no clue what an escape room is you should go, you’ll figure it out pretty quickly. I would recommend this place. Perfect for the day of a flight, only 29 minutes from DIA.
